Package org.wildstang.framework.io.inputs

Class I2CInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildstang.framework.io.inputs.Input
      • org.wildstang.framework.io.inputs.I2CInput
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WsI2CInput
    public abstract class I2CInput
extends Input
    First abstraction of Input representing I2C Inputs. Currently there are no implementations of this type.

      • setValue

        public void setValue​(byte[] p_newValue)
        Takes a new value stores it and notifys listeners. This is a public version of setNewValue() for manual value updating.
        Parameters:
        p_newValue - New value read for the Input.

      • readRawValue

        Abstract function to request and return the raw value from hardware.
        Returns:
        The latest value read from hardware.

        Returns the latest stored value from the Input.
